title: Seth Gyaniram Bansidhar Podar College
text:
Seth Gyaniram Bansidhar Podar College () also referred to as Podar College is a private college in the town <a href="Nawalgarh%2C%20Rajasthan">Nawalgarh</a> of <a href="Jhunjhunu%20district">Jhunjhunu district</a> in the Indian state <a href="Rajasthan">Rajasthan</a>. Its offering education in <a href="arts">arts</a>, <a href="science">science</a> and <a href="commerce">commerce</a> streams at undergraduate and postgraduate levels.
History.
Run by the Anandilal Podar Trust, Seth Gyaniram Bansidhar Podar College, Nawalgarh is an educational institution in the <a href="Shekhawati">Shekhawati</a> region. The college has grown from a Brahmcharyashram established in 1921. Before the formation of <a href="University%20of%20Rajasthan">University of Rajasthan</a>, the college had been affiliated to <a href="Dr.%20B.%20R.%20Ambedkar%20University">Agra University</a>. <a href="Mahatma%20Gandhi">Mahatma Gandhi</a> as the first Chairman Trustee of the college. The Trust came into being as the result of a benevolent donation by Shri Anandilalji Podar for the uplift of education in the region.
